name: Text Adventure
description: Text adventure made with HTML, CSS, SASS, and JavaScript. Original interactive fiction writing.

name: React Weather
description: Weather dashboard that shows the weather for a selected city using the Open Weather API.

name: Bin Out
description: Full stack web app providing a platform for people to hire others to take their bin out for them. Allows users to login and send requests to other users.

name: EPL Fixture Guide
description: Single-page web app for viewing the time, location, and weather of upcoming fixtures for a selected EPL team along with a recent highlights video and the EPL ladder.
